query:
SELECT 
  po.id,
  po.orderNumber,
  po.customerOrderNumber,
  po.shippingStatus,
  po.status as pickingStatus,
  i.id as invoiceId,
  i.invoiceNumber,
  i.status as invoiceStatus
FROM pickingOrders po
LEFT JOIN invoices i ON i.pickingOrderId = po.id
WHERE po.customerOrderNumber = 'PED-0016';
